caption: Zacarías González Velázquez (Spanish, 1763–1834), formerly attributed to Francisco Bayeu y Subias (Spanish, 1734 - 1795), San Pascual Bailón, Kneeling, with a Sketch of His Head, ca. 1767. Black chalk heightened with white chalk; 24 × 19.3 cm. Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund and Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund (2002-84)
